features: Premium Design: Effortlessly prepare a wide range of recipes and enjoy the benefits of easy cleaning, perfect preheating, deep vessel shapes, comfortable handling, and superior heat distribution in one exceptional cookware set.

Durable Construction: The hard anodized exterior and forged design is built to stand the test of time. Titanium Non-stick coating keeps food sliding smoothly, making cooking easier and cleanup a breeze
Thermo-Spot Technology: Unique heat indicator turns solid red when pans are properly preheated so you'll know exactly when to start cooking for perfect results every time.

Comfortable Handles: Riveted silicone handles provide a comfortable and secure grip. Whether cooking a favorite recipe or an experimental new dish, this collection is tough enough to take on all your cooking needs.

Versatile Cooking Options: This set can withstand oven temperatures up to 400°F (lids up to 350°F) and is suitable for all stove tops, excluding induction, making it a versatile and reliable addition to your kitchen. Limited lifetime warranty.
body.description: T-fal Ultimate Hard Anodized cookware is truly hard anodized inside and out. The core is 2x stronger than stainless steel​ and the 5 layer construction on frypans ensures reliable non-stick use after use. Titanium PTFE non-stick provides easy food release and cleanup every time. This product contains PTFE for its non-stick properties. For more information about chemicals in this product, visit: www.t-falusa.com/cookware-commitments.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Long Lasting Construction: From everyday cooking to intense culinary adventures, the hard anodized exterior is designed to stand the test of time. Thermo-Spot Technology: Unique heat indicator turns solid red when the pans are properly preheated for optimal cooking results. Versatile & Even Heating: Even heat base eliminates hot spots enabling precise temperature control. Dishwasher and Oven Safe: Save time and effort with easy to clean cookware, safe for dishwasher use. Oven safe up to 400°F (with lid 350°F).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Nonstick Fry Pan for Everyday Cooking
reviews.reviewText: Extremely satisfied with my purchase. This fry pan has quickly become a staple in my kitchen, and I would recommend it to anyone.Pros:- Perfectly nonstick: The nonstick coating on this pan is truly impressive. I've cooked various dishes, from eggs to stir-fries, and nothing sticks to the surface. This makes cooking and cleaning a breeze.- Heats up quickly: The hard-anodized aluminum construction of the pan ensures that it heats up quickly and evenly. This feature has significantly reduced my cooking time and ensures that my food is cooked uniformly.- Durable and long-lasting: The pan's hard-anodized exterior provides a strong protective layer, making it resistant to scratches and other signs of wear. I am confident that this pan will last me for years to come.Cons:- None so far: I have not encountered any issues with this fry pan, and I am thoroughly satisfied with its performance.In conclusion, the T-fal Ultimate Hard Anodized Nonstick Fry Pan has exceeded my expectations. Its nonstick surface, quick heating, and durability make it a valuable addition to my kitchen. I highly recommend this fry pan to anyone in search of a reliable and efficient nonstick pan for everyday cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great -- Easy To Use & Clean
reviews.reviewText: T-Fal Ultimate Hard Anodized Nonstick Fry Pan came well packaged in large box. The pan is beautiful! It's solid and substantial but not too heavy. The coated surface is typical of a Teflon pan but it has ridges on the bottom for more even heating. I tried it and fried some meatballs and onions. The pan takes a few minutes to warm up but then it does an excellent job cooking everything evenly. Nothing sticks to the surface (yet). The handle is a comfortable rubber like grip that stays cool while the pan is in use.It's also easy to clean. You do have to cure the pan before use by heating the pan up on low and wiping it with vegetable oil. Repeat after 10 cycles in the dishwasher. I'm not going to be putting mine in the dishwasher. It's easy enough to clean with a sponge and detergent in the sink.Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase.~ Kort

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this pan
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing pan. Non stick, heats up fast and very easy to clean. I bought a large size and will be replacing my smaller pans with this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: This is our new favorite pan! It's very well made and very nonstick. Evenly distributes heat, is a great size for anything from grilled cheese to sauce making- I love the higher sides. Cleans up easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A very good frying pan
reviews.reviewText: This non stick pan is very good and easy to clean. You will still need a iron frying pan for browning meat. Won’t crust steak chops or chicken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Decent Product
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these 12" skillets a couple of months ago. I was delivered within 2 days (I'm a Prime member) and it arrived safely packed and undamaged. It comes with a very nice vented, clear glass lid. The construction is very solid - it feels well-made and a little heavy. The material it's built from (Titanium) appears to be excellent - no more worrying about flaking Teflon. I did a lot of research on no-stick skillets and this brand (company) often made it into the top 10, so I thought I'd try it out. The price is excellent considering what you get.I usually cook on high heat and so far, have had no issues (no warping, charring, distortions, etc.) with this skillet. I mainly cook omelets but have also cooked chicken breasts and steaks. I usually cook with Canola or Olive oil and sometimes Coconut oil. Some people have claimed that you don't need any oil or anything to prevent sticking when using these. I experimented with cooking eggs with no oil and it was nearly a disaster - the eggs stuck for the most part (not too badly though). I don't cooking without some sort of oil to prevent sticking.My biggest complaint is the bottom of the skillet. I have a gas range and unfortunately, the bottom of the skillet is extremely slippery. On a few occasions the skillet nearly slipped off the stove. I got used to it and was more careful and to date, have had no accidents (keep the little ones away from this when it's used for cooking). The other thing about the red dot in the center (inside the pan) glowing red when it's ready... meh. I haven't noticed it glowing. None of these issues really lowers my rating on this product. I recommend it. We'll see how it holds up over the years.Also, I just bought a second one recently because it's a solid product and I couldn't stand my awful Rachel Ray Teflon skillets anymore.I hope this is helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered on prime day and got an excellent price. This pan is sturdy and holds up well. No issues. Favorite pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Durable Easy-to-Clean Pan
reviews.reviewText: My regular pan has held up well. No coating removal or damage. Best pan, by far, I have ever owned. Strongly recommend this pan. Heat not even but using on small electric burner, so that may be to blame. Considered giving as Christmas gift to mother.
Endlich wieder eine vernünftige Bratpfanne!Hier brennt nichts fest!Deshalb Superleicht zu reinigen.Super👍

I bought this fry pan two weeks ago and it is one of the best items in my kitchen. The pan is well built and very sturdy. The glass top is great to see the food as it is cooking, and it also fits my other stainless 12" pan. Cleaning up is a snap. After using the pan all I need to do is wipe the inside of the pan with a damp sponge towel and it is ready for the next use. Food doesn't stick at all. Clean up works best if the pan is slightly warm.I read some of the other reviews that were not satisfactory in the buyers opinion and the only thing I can see is that they didn't follow the manufacturers recommendations to "season" the pan before first use and to keep the heat lower when cooking. How can you expect a pan to work properly when you don't follow the recommendations ?I would recommend this pan to anyone who loves to cook with a non-stick pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately way larger (diameter) and shallower than I anticipated, the heating part of my hob does not cover the full diameter of the pan base, probably only about 2\3. Said that, once the pan is hot all round it cook's great and cleans easily, I don't use soap or and scourers, generally only use paper towels to wipe down. If loads of food leftover on pan I rinse off with just hot water.

Very happy with this pan. After reading the reviews I decided to buy it as I was in need of a new pan and it is similar to a previous one I had. I have used it heaps to cook with and am very pleased with it.
